name: Quincy
inGameDesc: Proud, strong and intelligent, Quincy uses his bow to perform feats of amazing skill.

name: Gwendolin
inGameDesc: Gwendolin believes there hasn't yet been a Bloon problem that can't be solved with fire. Lots of fire.

name: Striker Jones
inGameDesc: Striker Jones is a strong Commander who uses his knowledge of long range combat to greatly boost the power of explosives.

name: Obyn Greenfoot
inGameDesc: Commanding powers of nature, Obyn can shoot through solid obstacles with his spirit wolf attack.

name: Captain Churchill
inGameDesc: In his armored tank, the Captain is a no-nonsense powerhouse on the battlefield.

name: Benjamin
inGameDesc: Using his elite hacking skills, Benjamin can create extra money for the cause.

name: Ezili
inGameDesc: Ezili is a wielder of dark arts and manipulator of Bloons. Beware.

name: Pat Fusty
inGameDesc: Pat is a huge monkey of enormous strength. His unique size and power is a great asset in the war on Bloons.

name: Adora
inGameDesc: Adora's devotion compels her to strike Bloons down with furious vengeance.

name: Admiral Brickell
inGameDesc: Command all your water-based Monkeys to decisive victory. Requires water to place.

name: Etienne
inGameDesc: This high-tech hero can pursue the Bloons wherever they go with his remote-controlled drone.

name: Sauda
inGameDesc: With a calm fury, Sauda can carve Bloons up with her twin razor-sharp swords.

name: Psi
inGameDesc: A gifted monkey child, Psi uses only the power of the mind to destroy Bloons from the inside out.

name: Geraldo
inGameDesc: Geraldo the shopkeeper sells a selection of useful items and zaps Bloons with his lightning attack.
